bibl.title: Letter from Walter Reed to Emilie Lawrence Reed, April 29, 1879

div1.p: Reed writes that he received her letter to him.

div1.head: Letter from Walter Reed to Emilie Lawrence Reed, April 29, 1879
div1.p:
Arrived safely
at Vegas at 4,20 P.M- found your
postal written after you left
St. Louis- was so glad to hear
that you had made the neces-
-sary connections & changes
without trouble or delay- Papa's
boy deserves a thousand sweet
kisses for being so good & giving
mother so little care. Tell him
so & give him the kisses- Doesn't
he seem to miss me any? Just
got a telegram from Col. Compton
He left Apache 27th-will, I
think, meet us at Albuquer-
erque. Mrs. C. is very pleasant
& gives me no trouble whatever.
Enjoy yourself all you can
possibly- Think of me & kiss the boy,
